alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, southeastern Clay, southwestern Randolph, western Calhoun and northern Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/... At 638 PM EDT/538 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Fort Gaines, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Blakely, Edison, Arlington, Centerville, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Parksville, Carnegie, Hayes, Rock Hill, Early Co A/p, Jones Crossing, Suttons Corner, Harrisons Mill, Barnes, Zetto, Moye and Cordrays Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
